name: 8-bit
desc: Keep score of your team's damage dealt. For each high score you beat, 8-bit champions gain Attack Damage.
stats: 14% AD and unlock a final high score, that rewards you with a grand prize.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruiser gain bonus maximum Health.

name: Country
desc: When your team loses 30% of their Health, a Dreadsteed that empowers your team. Each Country star level increases the Dreadsteed's Health and Attack Damage.

name: Crowd Diver
desc:
After Crowd Divers die, they leap onto the furthest enemy, dealing 300 magic damage. Enemies within 1 hex are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

They also deal bonus damage, increased by 1% each second.

name: Dazzler
desc: Dazzler' Ability reduce their target's damage by 10% and deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds.

name: Big Shot
desc: Big Shots gain Attack Damage. which increases for 3 seconds when they use their Ability.

name: Edgelord
desc: Edgelords gain Attack Speed which doubles when their target drops target drops below 50% Health. Edgelords with 1-hex range also dash through them on their next attack.

name: EDM
desc:
Use the EDM selector item to choose an EDM champion and see the frequency for each.

At the selected champions's frequency, your EDM champions cast the selected Ability with modified effectiveness.

name: Emo
desc: Emo Champions' Ability cost less Mana to cast, and they gain Mana whenever an allied champion dies.
abstract: bond:MP cost:(20%/30%/40% less),on ally death gain MP:(20/30/40),AP:(0/0/+20)

name: Executioner
desc: Executioner Abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Damage. Their Critical Strike Chance is increased based on their target's missing Health.
stats: 5% Crit Damage, Up to 25% Crit Chance
15% Crit Damage, Up to 80% Crit Chance
30% Crit Damage, Up to 160% Crit Chance

name: Mosher
desc:
Moshers gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp, which increases up to 100% based on their missing Health.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

name: Disco
desc:
Summon a movable Disco Ball.

Combat start: Allies next to it gain Attack Speed and healing immediately and every 3 seconds.
stats: 2 Disco Balls, 12% Attack Speed, 3% max Health

name: Guardian
desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their max Health.

name: Hyperpop
desc: When Hyperpop champions use an Ability, they grant Mana and 4 seconds of Attack Speed to their 2 closest allies.

name: Jazz
desc: For each active trait (except uniques), your team gains bonus Health and deals bonus damage.

name: K/DA
desc: Your team gains max Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage if they are in a lighted hex. K/DA champions gain double!
stats: +45% max Health, +45 AP & AD, 10 mana per second

name: Pentakill
desc:
Pentakill champions reduce incoming damage by 15% and deal bonus damage. For each champion kill, a Pentakill champion rocks out and increases their damage bonus by 25%.

On the 5th kills, all Pentakill champions rock out and your team gains 50% Attack Speed.

name: Heartsteel
desc: Earn Hearts by killing enemies. Gain even more by losing player combat. Every 4 player combats, convert Hearts into powerful rewards!
stats: 18x Hearts, Gain rewards every round and keep 80% of you Hearts!
abstract: bond:Hearts multiplier:(1/2/5.5/18), rewards every round and keep 80% Hearts at 4

name: Punk
desc:
Punks gain bonus Health and Attack Damage, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After Punks fight in combat, your 1st Shop reroll costs 1 gold and grants 3% bonus instead!

name: Rapidfire
desc:
Your team gains 10% Attack Speed.

Rapidfire champions gain more on every attack, up to 10 stacks.

name: Sentinel
desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain double.

name: Spellweaver
desc: Your team gains 15 Ability Power. Spellweavers gain more, plus extra Ability Power whenever a Spellweaver casts an Ability.

name: Superfan
desc: Superfans improve your Headliner!
stats:
Item upgrades to radiant

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

name: True Damage
desc: True Damage champions deal bonus true damage. If they are holding an item, they gain a unique Bling Bonus for their Ability.
